createaccount_jsx.before_creating_account: before you can create another account.

createaccount_jsx.to_continue_please_click_on_the_link_in_: To continue please click on the link in the email we've sent you.

createaccount_jsx.phone_number_has_been_verified: E-mail has been verified, please continue the registration.

invites_jsx.create_invite_info: Cheques (invite codes) are a universal tool for transferring of GOLOS tokens to other people outside the blockchain. There are two ways to redeem the code: transfer its balance to your account or register a new account using it.
invites_jsx.referral_invite:
During the year 10%% of user rewards (registered with this invite)
will be credited to your balance.
invites_jsx.success: Created! Save it (private key or link)
invites_jsx.register_link: Link to register with this invite check (for 1 user):
invites_jsx.claim_wrong_secret_cannot_fetch: Cannot connect to server to check invite code

mobilevalidation_js.enter_confirm_code: Confirmation code is sent to your e-mail. Please enter code below:
mobilevalidation_js.you_can_change_your_number: You can select another one e-mail.
mobilevalidation_js.waiting_from_you: Waiting SMS message with confirmation code %(code)s from your number to our verification number %(phone)s.
mobilevalidation_js.waiting_from_you_line_1: Please, send SMS with text %(code)s on %(phone)s
mobilevalidation_js.waiting_from_you_line_2: Golos.id interested in registration real people, not robots. We ask you to send SMS.

mobilevalidation_js.attempts_300: Confirmation was attempted a moment ago. You can try again only in 5 minutes

server_errors.too_many_requests: Too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
server_errors.registration_with_email_disabled: Registering with e-mail is temporarily disabled.
server_errors.email_already_used: This e-mail has already been used.
server_errors.cannot_send_email: Cannot send e-mail. Please contact us and we will solve the problem.
server_errors.not_verified: Cannot register, not verified, or browser does not stores cookies.
server_errors.recaptcha_v2_failed: You didn't solved the "I'm not a robot" captcha.
server_errors.already_registered: Only one Golos account per user is allowed in order to prevent abuse.
server_errors.ip_account_rate_limit_LIMIT: Only one Golos account allowed per IP address every %(LIMIT)s min.
server_errors.no_such_invite: No such invite code. Please sure you are correctly typed its code.
server_errors.blockchain_not_available_for_invite: We sorry but blockchain is not available now. Wait a moment and try again, please.
server_errors.blockchain_not_available: We sorry but blockchain is not available now. Wait a moment and try again, please.

suggestpassword_jsx.APP_NAME_cannot_recover_passwords_keep_t: %(APP_NAME)s cannot recover passwords. Keep this page in a secure location, such as a fireproof safe or safety deposit box.
suggestpassword_jsx.after_printing_write_down_your_user_name: After printing, write down your user name

tips_js.tip_balance_hint: Balance that you use to reward users and that you use to earn rewards for yourself. Tokens from it can also be sent to increase the Golos Power.
tips_js.claim_balance_hint: Balance of your share of the emission of Golos blockchain tokens, which you can use to top up your TIP balance or increase the Golos Power.
tips_js.claim_expiration_hint: The tokens request window will end
tips_js.tradeable_tokens_that_may_be_transferred: Tradable digital tokens that can be transferred anywhere at any time.
tips_js.LIQUID_TOKEN_can_be_converted_to_VESTING: For example, converted to Golos Power or sent to the TIP balance for rewards.
tips_js.influence_tokens_which_give_you_more_con: The more Golos Power you have, the higher the percentage goes to the CLAIM balance and the higher the impact on the project development by selecting delegates and supporting applications for funding from the workers foundation.
tips_js.the_more_you_hold_the_more_you_influence: The more you hold the more you influence post rewards and earn for accurate voting.
tips_js.vesting_emission_per_day_title:
Amount that, depending on the Golos Power, is transferred daily to the CLAIM balance
(your share of the blockchain token issue per day)
tips_js.the_estimated_value_is_based_on_an_avera: The estimated cost is calculated on an 7-day average cost of %(LIQUID_TOKEN)s.
tips_js.VESTING_TOKEN_is_non_transferrable_and_r: %(VESTING_TOKEN2)s is non-transferrable and requires 2 months (8 payments) to convert back to %(LIQUID_TOKEN)s.
tips_js.converted_VESTING_TOKEN_can_be_sent_to_y: Converted %(VESTING_TOKEN)s can be sent to yourself or someone else but can not transfer again without converting back to %(LIQUID_TOKEN)s.

the_rules_of_APP_NAME.one: The first rule of %(APP_NAME)s is: Do not lose your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.second: The second rule of %(APP_NAME)s is: Do NOT lose your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.third: The third rule of %(APP_NAME)s is: We cannot recover your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.fourth: The fourth rule: If you can remember the password, it's not secure.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.fifth: The fifth rule: Use only randomly-generated passwords.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.sixth: The sixth rule: Do not tell anyone your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.seventh: The seventh rule: Always back up your password.

g.backup_password_by_storing_it: Back it up by storing in your password manager or a text file.
